recipe.name: Falafel Patties
recipe.notes: A disaster in the making -- some ingredient or prep is off and all that is made is a disgusting, unfryable mush -- at least in our Winter/Sprint 2011 cooking session.
recipe.preparation: Mix all ingredients except parsley in a food processor or blender.  Mix in parsley by hand.  Lightly oil a skillet and heat on medium-low.  Drop spoonfuls of falafel mixture onto lightly oiled skillet and brown. Serve in pitas with lettuce, tomato, onion, radishes and creamy dressing.
recipe.source_name: "High Country Recipes", The Chester High Ski Team, contributed by Angel Isaacson
